title: Just remove the godamn shield on Yasuo
body:
Any reason why a manaless champion should have a double crit chance as well as built in armor pen WITH a nice shield too GEE i wonder why everyone plays him. Remove the shield and then buff his E or just revert any other past nerfs to compensate but im telling you its the fucking shield that has to go.  

510 dmg can be shielded at level 18
